definitions.definition: Any of various Old World rodent species belonging to the subfamily Cricetinae .
examples: The hamster stuffed his puffy cheeks with food.

definitions.definition: Other rodents of similar appearance, such as the maned hamster or crested hamster, Lophiomys imhausi , mouse-like hamsters of genus Calomyscus , and the white-tailed rat ( Mystromys albicaudatus ).

main_definition: Any of various Old World rodent species belonging to the subfamily Cricetinae .
secondary_definitions: Other rodents of similar appearance, such as the maned hamster or crested hamster, Lophiomys imhausi , mouse-like hamsters of genus Calomyscus , and the white-tailed rat ( Mystromys albicaudatus ).
